sentences.english: Hacksaw Ridge and Lion also received six nods.
sentences.chinese: 《血戰鋼鋸嶺》和《雄獅》也獲得六項提名。

sentences.english: Fight to the finish for the recovery of Peiping, Tientsin and northeastern China.
sentences.chinese: 爲收復平津和東北而血戰到底。

sentences.english: The bloody events of the ongoing war would indisputably provide an answer to that speculation.
sentences.chinese: 持續不斷的血戰，將不容置疑地回答這個問題。

sentences.english: Fight to the finish in defence of northern China and the seacoast.
sentences.chinese: 爲保衛華北和沿海各地而血戰到底。

sentences.english: The Japanese sword grain dragons and retreat, brave sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 刀紋龍與日軍血戰，英勇犧牲。

sentences.english: We Chinese have the spirit to fight the enemy to the last drop of our blood.
sentences.chinese: 我們中華民族有同自己的敵人血戰到底的氣概。

sentences.english: Osami Nagano can be beaten, but not without one hell of a scrap.
sentences.chinese: 永野修身也可以被打敗，只不過一場血戰不可避免。

definition: dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
